amendment.description: To require a report on claims related to the bombing of the LaBelle Discotheque in Berlin, Germany.

vote.text: Amendment SA 2551 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 2551 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Levin. (consideration: CR S12778-12791; text: CR S12785-12786) To require a report on claims related to the bombing of the LaBelle Discotheque in Berlin, Germany.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 2551 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 2551 proposed by Senator Warner for Senator Levin.
